TEXT.TITLE: SURGIDYNE INC FILES FOR INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Surgidyne Inc said it filed a registration statement for a proposed initial public offering of its common stock. The company proposes to offer 1,125,000 common shares at about 2.00 dlrs a share. The offering would be underwritten by Westonka Investments Inc. Surgidyne develops and markets specialty medical and surgical products. Reuter
